creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Marjorie Bissinger
description: blossoming grey orchids with black and grey foliage at center of fan; lines of text at L and R; rectangular relief stamp URC; rectangular intaglio stamp with rounded edges L center
inscription: L and R sides: Amid the mountains, the orchids aspire / to grow as freely as weeds; / Leaves warm themselves, flowers flutter, / saturated with the spirit of the season. / The orchid sends forth its fragrance, / although not extending too far, / It wafts past the dirt and dust / of the everyday world. (SA)
markings: URC, rectangular relief; L center rectangular intaglio
title: Orchids
